function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination in multisectoral responses to pandemics","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of resources, delayed response, and failure to support vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels, streamline decision-making processes, and prioritize vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Communication tools, data management systems, and decision-support software","People":"Vulnerable communities, government agencies, NGOs, and community health volunteers","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased food insecurity, malnutrition, and health disparities","Mitigation":"Map access to nutritious foods, ensure equitable distribution, and prioritize vulnerable families","Technologies":"Data mapping tools, distribution logistics software, and food security monitoring systems","People":"Vulnerable families, urban poor, and communities with limited resources","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","Impact":"Inadequate distribution of health information, delayed testing, and limited access to essential supplies","Mitigation":"Establish effective partnerships at the community level, empower community health volunteers, and ensure last-mile distribution of health information and supplies","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, health information systems, and rapid testing kits","People":"Community health volunteers, grassroots organizations, and at-risk populations","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, and community organizations"}]}
